name: sqlserver
description: Make a connection to Microsoft SQLServer Database on Enterprise Network

service-name.title: Service Name
service-name.description: Your own identifier name for this Service, Ex: production

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: Namespace where the Service proxy is being created (same as project name)

host.title: Database Host Name
host.description: Host Name of the database Server(must be reachable from cloud)

port.title: Database Port Number
port.description: Port Number for the database server

database-name.title: Database Name
database-name.description: Name of the Database connect to

binding-alias.title: Binding Alias Name
binding-alias.description: user supplied name to uniquely identify credentials of this service binding. ex:production-alice

username.title: User Name
username.description: User Name to use to connect to Database

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to use to connect to Database

application-type.title: Application Type
application-type.description: Type of Application this Database is used with

multi-source-pod.title: Multiple Sources in Application
multi-source-pod.description: Are there more one data source used in application? it true, see dashboard for more instructions
